description.english: Welcome back to Deponia
description.german: Willkommen zurück auf Deponia
description.brazilian: Bem-vindos de novo à Deponia
description.french: Heureux de vous revoir sur Déponia.
description.russian: С возвращением на Депонию
description.spanish: ¡Bienvenido de vuelta a Deponia!
description.schinese: 欢迎回到德波尼亚。
description.czech: Vítej zpět na Deponii.
description.italian: Bentornati su Deponia!

displayName.brazilian: E de novo, e de novo, e...
displayName.french: Encore et encore, et encore, et...
displayName.spanish: Y otra vez y otra y...
displayName.czech: A znova, a znova, a znova...

description.english: Did anyone get that?
description.german: Ist irgendwer hier durchgestiegen?
description.brazilian: Alguém entendeu isso?
description.french: Quelqu'un a réussi à l'avoir ?
description.russian: Кто-нибудь это слышал?
description.spanish: ¿Alguien lo ha pillado?
description.schinese: 有人得到吗？
description.czech: Už si toho někdo všiml?
description.italian: Qualcuno ci ha preso?

displayName.schinese: 燃烧吧。极乐天堂，燃烧吧！

description.english: Slightly above body temperature
description.german: Angenehme Temperaturen inklusive
description.brazilian: Um pouco acima da temperatura corporal
description.french: Il fait un peu chaud pour la saison.
description.russian: С приятной температурой
description.spanish: Algo más allá de la temperatura corporal
description.schinese: 比身体温度稍高。
description.czech: Stěží nad tělesnou teplotou.
description.italian: Leggermente superiore alla temperatura corporea.

description.english: The perfect place for mayhem
description.german: Der Perfekte Ort für einen Chaoten
description.french: Un endroit idéal pour semer le chaos.
description.spanish: Un lugar perfecto para sembrar el caos
description.russian: Прекрасное место для разгрома
description.brazilian: O lugar perfeito pra confusão
description.schinese: 混乱中的完美区域。
description.czech: Dokonalé místo k chaosu.
description.italian: Il posto perfetto per il caos.

displayName.english: Boat of love, boat of love
displayName.german: Boat of love, boat of love
displayName.brazilian: Barco do amor, barco do amor

description.english: He is a true romantic
description.german: Er ist ein Romantiker.
description.brazilian: Ele é romanticozinho
description.french: C'est un vrai romantique.
description.russian: Он настоящий романтик
description.spanish: Es un auténtico romántico
description.schinese: 他真的很浪漫。
description.czech: On je opravdový romantik.
description.italian: È un autentico romantico.

description.english: What a wild ride it has been...
description.german: Ja, das war eine wilde Zeit...
description.french: On s'est bien amusés...
description.spanish: Vaya aventura, la nuestra...
description.russian: Это были лихие времена...
description.brazilian: Que viagem doida essa...
description.schinese: 多么疯狂的旅行……
description.czech: Ale byla to divoká jízda...
description.italian: Che avventura, la nostra...

displayName.french: Un portail, ça va, trois portails, bonjour les dégâts
displayName.italian: Portale che va, portale che trovi

description.english: Logic is the last resort of the uninspired.
description.german: Wer Logikfehler findet, darf sie behalten.
description.french: La logique est le dernier recours des désespérés.
description.spanish: La lógica es el último recurso de los que carecen de inspiración.
description.russian: Логика - удел людей без воображения.
description.brazilian: A lógica é o recurso último dos sem inspiração.
description.polish: Logika - ulubiona rozrywka ludzi bez wyobraźni.
description.schinese: 逻辑是平凡之人最后的乐园。
description.turkish: Hayal gücü olmayanların son çaresi, mantıktır.
description.czech: Logika je poslední útočiště lidí bez inspirace.
description.italian: La logica è l'ultima risorsa di che è privo di ispirazione.

displayName.brazilian: E tudo volta ao ponto de partida
displayName.turkish: Ve Her Şey Eski Haline Döner
displayName.czech: A všechno se točí v kruzích

description.english: I told you: do not tempt endings!
description.german: Ich hab' euch doch gesagt: Enden soll man nicht herausfordern!
description.french: On vous avait prévenu : il ne faut pas tenter les fins.
description.spanish: Te lo dije: ¡no tientes a los finales!
description.russian: Говорил же я: не искушайте концовки!
description.brazilian: Eu já te falei: não desafie os finais!
description.schinese: 我告诉过你：不要改变结局！
description.czech: Já ti říkal - nesnaž se nic zakončovat!
description.italian: Io l'avevo detto: mai sfidare i finali!

description.english: Please put the torch back where it belongs.
description.german: Pack' den Schweißbrenner wieder an den Ort zurück von dem du ihn hast.
description.french: Remettre le chalumeau à sa place.
description.spanish: Por favor, devuelve la antorcha a su sitio.
description.russian: Пожалуйста, верни факел на место.
description.brazilian: Por favor, devolva a tocha pro lugar dela.
description.schinese: 请把火炬放回原处。
description.czech: Vraťte prosím pochodeň tam, kam patří.
description.italian: Per favore, rimetti la torcia dove l'hai trovata.

description.english: He doesn't deserve any better! Kick the Fewlock as often as you can.
description.german: Er hat es nicht anders verdient! Tritt den Fewlock so oft du kannst.
description.brazilian: Ele merece muito mais! Chute o fewlock o máximo de vezes que puder.
description.french: Frapper le Fewlock autant de fois que possible.
description.russian: Он сам напросился! Отвесь чморлоку как можно больше пинков.
description.spanish: ¡No merece tu compasión! Patea al pocospelos tantas veces como puedas.
description.polish: Nie zasłużył na nic lepszego! Skop fewlocka najmocniej, jak tylko możesz.
description.schinese: 他没什么好的！就像你平时一样踢福洛克。
description.turkish: Hak ettiğini ver ona! Fewlock'u olabildiğince çok tekmele.
description.czech: Nic lepšího si nezaslouží! Kopni monstrum kdykoliv se ti zlíbí.
description.italian: Non si merita niente di più! Scalcia più Fewlock che puoi.

description.english: Get distracted by a fewlock while three bars are glowing.
description.german: Lass Dich bei drei stark glühenden Riegeln von einem Fewlock ablenken.
description.french: Se faire distraire par les Fewlocks quand trois barres sont brillantes.
description.spanish: Déjate distraer por un pocospelos con tres barras activadas.
description.russian: Отвлекись на чморлока, когда горят три белых индикатора.
description.brazilian: Distraia-se com um fewlock enquanto as três barras estiverem brilhando.
description.polish: Pozwól fewlockowi odwrócić twoją uwagę, gdy rozgrzane będą trzy pręty.
description.schinese: 当三个条发光时，因一个福洛克分心。
description.turkish: Üç demir yanarken Fewlock dikkatını dağıtsın.
description.czech: Nechej se rozptylovat monstry, dokud se nerozsvítí tři tyče.
description.italian: Fatti distrarre da un Fewlock con tre barre attivate.

description.english: Destroy many, many toilet seats.
description.german: Zerstöre eine Menge Porzellanklobrillen.
description.brazilian: Destrua muitíssimas tampas de privada.
description.french: Détruire une grande quantité de lunettes de toilettes.
description.russian: Уничтожь очень много сидений для унитаза.
description.spanish: Acaba con muchos, pero muchos asientos de váter.
description.schinese: 毁坏很多、很多马桶坐垫。
description.czech: Znič hodně, ale opravdu hodně záchodových prkének.
description.italian: Distruggi tanti, tantissimi sedili del gabinetto.

description.english: Slingshot the elephant before he can say anything.
description.german: Schleudere den Elefanten weg, bevor er was sagen kann.
description.brazilian: Atire no elefante com o estilingue antes que ele consiga soltar um ai.
description.french: Faire valdinguer l'éléphant avant qu'il n'ait prononcé un mot.
description.russian: Катапультируй слона, пока он не успел заговорить.
description.spanish: Dale al elefante antes de que pueda decir ni mu.
description.polish: Wystrzel słonia, zanim zdąży cokolwiek powiedzieć.
description.schinese: 在大象说话前用弹弓打。
description.turkish: Bir şey demeden önce fili gönder.
description.czech: Zaútoč na slona prakem dřív, než stačí cokoliv říct.
description.italian: Colpisci l'elefante prima che possa dire una parola.

description.english: Don't put the fruit to the middle square.
description.german: Leg am Anfang das Faulobst nicht in die Mitte.
description.brazilian: Não coloque a fruta no quadrado do meio.
description.french: Ne pas mettre de fruit dans la case du milieu.
description.russian: Не клади фрукты на квадрат в центре.
description.spanish: No pongas la fruta en la casilla central.
description.polish: Nie kładź owocu na środkowym polu.
description.schinese: 不要把水果放在广场中间。
description.czech: Nedávej ovoce do prostředního čtverce.
description.italian: Non mettere il frutto nella casella centrale.

description.english: Give Tuck all possible gun variants.
description.german: Gib Tuck alle Varianten der Wumme.
description.brazilian: Entregue ao Tuck todas as variantes de arma possíveis.
description.french: Donner toutes les variantes possibles du fusil à Tuck.
description.russian: Дай Туку все варианты оружия.
description.spanish: Dale a Tuck todas las armas posibles.
description.polish: Daj Tuckowi każdy możliwy wariant broni.
description.schinese: 给塔克所有可能的枪支。
description.czech: Dej Tuckovy všechny možné varianty zbraně.
description.italian: Offri a Tuck ogni arma possibile.

description.english: Let Rufus eat a lot of icecream.
description.german: Gib Rufus oft Eis zu essen.
description.brazilian: Deixe Rufus comer muito sorvete.
description.french: Faire manger beaucoup de glaces à Rufus.
description.russian: Накорми Руфуса мороженым.
description.spanish: Deja que Rufus se harte a zampar helado.
description.schinese: 让鲁弗斯吃很多冰淇淋。
description.czech: Nech Rufuse sežrat hrozně moc zmrzliny.
description.italian: Fai mangiare un sacco di gelati a Rufus.

description.english: Create every jackalope and clone it.
description.german: Stelle jeden Wolpertinger her und lass ihn klonen.
description.french: Créer et cloner tous les jackalopes possibles.
description.spanish: Crea todos los lebrílopes posibles y clónalos.
description.russian: Создай все виды шакалоп и клонируй их.
description.brazilian: Crie todas as lebríopes e clone-os.
description.polish: Stwórz każdą możliwą szakalopę i sklonuj ją.
description.schinese: 创造所有混种并且克隆。
description.turkish: Bütün boynuzlu tavşanları yap ve klonla.
description.czech: Vytvoř všechny stvůry a naklonuj je.
description.italian: Crea ogni tipo di jackalope e clonalo.

description.english: Mix the drink first, then grind down the maggot.
description.german: Stelle erst den Drink her und zerkleinere dann die Made.
description.brazilian: Primeiro, misture a bebida, depois triture a larva.
description.french: Mixer d'abord la boisson, puis l'asticot.
description.russian: Сначала смешай напитки, потом прокрути личинку.
description.spanish: Prepara el cóctel primero y luego tritura a la larva.
description.polish: Najpierw wymieszaj drinka, a później zmiel robaka.
description.schinese: 先混合饮料，然后磨碎蛆虫。
description.turkish: Önce içkiyi karıştır, sonra kurtçuğu ekle.
description.czech: Napřed namíchej drink, pak rozdrť červa.
description.italian: Prima mixa il drink, poi macina il verme.

description.english: Reach almost 10000 fun points.
description.german: Bekomme fast 10000 Funpunkte.
description.brazilian: Consiga quase 10000 pontos divertidos.
description.french: Quasiment atteindre les 10 000 points de récréation.
description.russian: Набери почти 10 000 очков веселья.
description.spanish: Consigue casi 10 000 puntos de diversión.
description.schinese: 几乎达到10,000娱乐分数。
description.czech: Dosáhni skoro 10,000 zábavních bodů.
description.italian: Raggiungi quasi 10,000 punti-divertimento.

description.english: Dump a lot of hot coal into your crotch.
description.german: Kippe heisse Kohlen sehr oft in den Schritt.
description.brazilian: Deposite muito carvão quente na sua virilha.
description.french: Mettre beaucoup de braise sous la serviette.
description.russian: Опрокинь кучу горячих углей на себя.
description.spanish: Tírate carbón en ascuas sobre la entrepierna.
description.polish: Wrzuć dużo rozgrzanych węgli na swoje krocze.
description.schinese: 把大量炽热的煤炭倒入裤裆。
description.turkish: Pantolonuna bir sürü sıcak kömür koy.
description.czech: Hoď si do rozkroku hodně rozpálených uhlíků.
description.italian: Versa un bel po' di carboni ardenti nell'inguine.

description.english: Collect all photo variants before you take the final snapshot.
description.german: Sammle alle Foto Variationen, bevor Du das finale Foto machst.
description.brazilian: Reúna todas as variantes de foto antes de tirar a foto instantânea decisiva.
description.french: Collectionner toutes les photos possibles avant d'avoir la bonne.
description.russian: Собери все варианты фотографий прежде чем сделать финальный снимок.
description.spanish: Colecciona todas las fotos posibles antes de sacar la definitiva.
description.polish: Zrób każdy możliwy wariant zdjęcia, zanim cykniesz finalną fotkę.
description.schinese: 在最后拍照之前集齐所有照片类型。
description.turkish: Son fotoğrafları çekmeden önce bütün fotoğraf kombinasyonlarını topla.
description.czech: Fyfoť všechny možné varianty než se dostaneš k finální fotce.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le foto possibili prima di fare lo scatto finale.

description.english: Save your party, let nobody die.
description.german: Rette Deine Heldengruppe. Lass niemanden sterben.
description.french: Sauver tous les membres du groupe, personne ne doit mourir.
description.spanish: Salva tu fiesta: no dejes que muera nadie.
description.russian: Спаси свой отряд, никого не потеряв.
description.brazilian: Salve seu grupo, não deixe ninguém morrer.
description.polish: Ocal swoją drużynę. Nie pozwól nikomu zginąć.
description.schinese: 挽救你的派对。不要有人死。
description.turkish: Grubunu kurtar. Kimsenin ölmesine izin verme.
description.czech: Zachraň oslavu. Nenech nikoho umřít.
description.italian: Salva gli uomini del tuo gruppo. Nessuno deve morire.

description.english: Your party be damned, let them all die.
description.german: Töte Deine Heldengruppe. Lass jeden sterben.
description.french: Les autres, on s'en fout. Laisser tout le monde mourir.
description.spanish: Que le den a tu fiesta: deja que todos mueran.
description.russian: Твой отряд обречен, пусть они все погибнут.
description.brazilian: Dane-se seu grupo, deixe todo mundo morrer.
description.polish: Twoja drużyna nie ma szans. Pozwól wszystkim zginąć!
description.schinese: 你的派对受到诅咒—所有人全都死！
description.turkish: Grubun darma duman oldu. Hepsinin ölmesine izin ver.
description.czech: Oslava se zvrtla - ať všichni zemřou!
description.italian: Chi se ne importa dei tuoi uomini - falli morire tutti!

description.english: Find the dolphin.
description.german: Finde den Delphin.
description.brazilian: Encontre o golfinho.
description.french: Trouver le dauphin.
description.russian: Найди дельфина.
description.spanish: Encuentra el delfín.
description.schinese: 找到海豚。
description.czech: Najdi delfína.
description.italian: Trova il delfino.

description.english: Annoy the sea monster until it snaps.
description.german: Ärgere das See-Monster bis es genug hat.
description.brazilian: Irrite o monstro do mar até ele explodir.
description.french: Énerver le monstre marin jusqu'à ce qu'il pète un câble.
description.russian: Дразни морское чудовище, пока оно не психанет.
description.spanish: Incordia al monstruo marino hasta que se cabree.
description.polish: Drażnij potwora morskiego, aż się wkurzy.
description.schinese: 挑逗海怪直到它猛地咬住。
description.turkish: Çıldırana kadar deniz canavarının sinirini boz.
description.czech: Votravuj mořskou obludu dokud tě nesežere.
description.italian: Infastidisci il mostro marino fino a farlo scoppiare.

description.english: Find the scaffolding!
description.german: Finde das Gerüst!
description.brazilian: Encontre o andaime!
description.french: Trouver l'échafaudage !
description.russian: Найди леса!
description.spanish: ¡Encuentra el andamiaje!
description.schinese: 找到脚手架！
description.czech: Najdi lešení.
description.italian: Trova l'impalcatura!

displayName.brazilian: O cliente tem sempre a razão
displayName.spanish: El cliente siempre tiene la razón

description.english: Order a sausage from the sausage bot many times.
description.german: Verlange oft eine Wurst vom Wurstbot.
description.brazilian: Peça várias vezes salsicha para o robô de salsicha.
description.french: Commander plein de saucisses à la fête foraine.
description.russian: Много раз закажи сосиску у сосискобота.
description.spanish: Pide una salchicha al salchibot muy veces.
description.polish: Zamów wiele razy kiełbasę u kiełbaso-bota.
description.schinese: 多次向香肠机器人点香肠。
description.czech: Objednej si hodně párků od Párk-O-bota.
description.italian: Ordina una salsiccia dal salsic-bot diverse volte.

displayName.spanish: Maestro de los puzles de Kuvaq

description.english: Sucessfully complete all minigames in Kuvaq
description.german: Schaffe alle Minigames in Kuvaq.
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os minijogos em Kuvaq
description.french: Réussir tous les mini-jeux à Kuvaq.
description.russian: Успешно пройди все мини-игры в Куваке.
description.spanish: Completa con éxito todos los puzles de: Kuvaq.
description.schinese: 成功通关库瓦克所有小游戏。
description.czech: Úspěšně zakonči všechny minihry v Kuvaqu.
description.italian: Completa con successo tutti i minigiochi su Kuvaq.

description.english: Never pick up the paintball gun.
description.german: Nimm niemals die Paintballgun auf!
description.brazilian: Nunca pegue a arma de paintball.
description.french: Ne pas ramasser le fusil de paintball.
description.russian: Никогда не поднимай ружье для пейнтбола!
description.spanish: No cojas la pistola de paint ball.
description.schinese: 不要捡彩弹枪。
description.czech: Nikdy nezvedej paintbolovou zbraň.
description.italian: Non raccogliere il fucile da paintball.

displayName.spanish: Maestro de los puzles del Elíseo

description.english: Successfully complete all minigames on Elysium
description.german: Schaffe alle Minigames auf Elysium.
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os minijogos em Elysium.
description.french: Réussir tous les mini-jeux sur Élysium.
description.russian: Успешно пройди все мини-игры на Элизиуме.
description.spanish: Completa con éxito todos los puzles de: Elysium.
description.schinese: 成功通关极乐天堂所有小游戏。
description.czech: Úspěšně zakonči všechny minihry na Elysiu.
description.italian: Completa con successo tutti i minigiochi su Elysium.

description.english: Let the goat hop from flag to flag a lot of times.
description.german: Lass die Ziege oft von Fahne zu Fahne springen.
description.french: Laisse la chèvre sauter de drapeau en drapeau un certain nombre de fois.
description.spanish: Deja que la cabra salte de bandera en bandera muchas veces.
description.russian: Пусть козел много раз перепрыгнет с одного флага на другой.
description.brazilian: Deixe a cabra pular várias vezes de bandeira em bandeira.
description.polish: Spraw, by koza przeskakiwała między flagami wiele razy.
description.schinese: 让山羊在旗与旗之间跳很多次。
description.turkish: Keçinin bayraktan bayrağa birçok kez atlamasına izin ver.
description.czech: Nech hodněkrát kozu skákat od vlajky k vlajce.
description.italian: Fai saltare la capra da bandiera e bandiera per un sacco di volte.

description.english: Press the jukebox until you get a song.
description.german: Drücke die Jukebox so lange bis ein Song kommt.
description.brazilian: Aperte a máquina de música até ela tocar.
description.french: Appuyer sur le jukebox jusqu'à ce que vous ayez une chanson.
description.russian: Нажимай на музыкальный автомат, пока не заиграет песня.
description.spanish: Usa la gramola hasta que suene una canción.
description.polish: Włączaj grającą szafę, aż usłyszysz piosenkę.
description.schinese: 按自动唱机直到你听到一首歌。
description.turkish: Şarkı çıkana kadar müzik kutusuna bas.
description.czech: Mačkej jukebox dokud něco nezahraje.
description.italian: Usa il jukebox finché non parte una canzone.

description.english: Head the power inverter during slow-motion.
description.german: Köpfe den Stromumkehrer in der Zeitlupe.
description.french: Faire une tête avec l'inverseur de courant pendant le ralenti.
description.spanish: Cabecea el inversor de potencia durante la animación a cámara lenta.
description.russian: Ударь по инвертору тока в замедленной съемке.
description.brazilian: Controle o inversor de potência durante a câmera lenta.
description.schinese: 在慢动作中，头顶电源逆变器。
description.turkish: Yavaş çekim sırasında güç dönüştürücüye kafa at.
description.czech: Veď výměník během spomalení času.
description.italian: Colpisci l'invertitore di potenza durante lo slow-motion.

description.english: Wait until the countdown should be finished.
description.german: Warte, bis der Countdown abgelaufen sein müsste.
description.brazilian: Espere até que a contagem regressiva acabe sozinha.
description.french: Attendre jusqu'à la fin du temps... théorique.
description.russian: Дождись окончания обратного отсчета.
description.spanish: Espera a que pase la cuenta atrás.
description.schinese: 等到倒数数完。
description.czech: Počkej, dokud neskončí odpočet.
description.italian: Aspetta fino alla fine del countdown.

description.english: Use the milk on yourself.
description.german: Verwende die Milch auf sich selbst.
description.brazilian: Use o leite em você mesmo(a).
description.french: Utiliser le lait sur vous-même.
description.russian: Используй молоко для себя.
description.spanish: Utiliza la leche contigo mismo.
description.schinese: 把牛奶用在自己身上。
description.czech: Použij mléko sám na sebe.
description.italian: Usa il latte su te stesso.

description.english: Go through all portals.
description.german: Fahre durch alle drei Portale.
description.brazilian: Atravesse todos os portais.
description.french: Traverser tous les portails.
description.russian: Пройди через все порталы.
description.spanish: Atraviesa todos los portales.
description.schinese: 穿过所有入口。
description.czech: Projdi všemi portály.
description.italian: Attraversa tutti i portali.
